description: Time-related widgets for appointment calendar display including current time indicators and time column components

components.CurrentTimeLine: Isolated current time indicator widget with independent timer to prevent full calendar rebuilds.
components._TimeIndicatorCircle: Const widget providing circular indicator at the start of the current time line.
components._TimeLine: Const widget providing horizontal line extending across calendar columns.
